column4: is there a way to view all the ports that have been mapped with upnp through my router?
does anyone know a way i can view the ports that have been mapped with upnp?
what are you using for UPNP?

azuerus is one program i am useing, but im havving a problem with the port that azuerus wants to use is already maped to another computer, so i want to see what computer on my network it has been maped to, and what other ports have been maped on my network
